participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and supportive, with a strong passion for health and fitness.
participant_1.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a cancer survivor. i'm a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons.

participant_2.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.
